title: Sen. Elizabeth Warren | Damning Jan. 6 Hearings Reveal Trump Coup Plotters Had Criminal Intent: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the January 6 hearings providing a mountain of new evidence revealing that the people involved in Trump's relentless plan to overturn the election all had criminal intent and knew what they were doing was against the law. Then, Sen. Elizabeth Warren talks about Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson becoming the first Black woman on the Supreme Court, discusses the implications of the Supreme Court's decisions on climate change and Roe v. Wade, and reminds Americans to take action and focus on the election in November.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
